condition.description: The bi-entity condition type to check for.
condition.markdownDescription: The bi-entity condition type to check for.

type.description:
[Bi-entity Condition Type](https://origins.readthedocs.io/en/latest/types/bientity_condition_types/undirected)

Checks if the specified bi-entity condition is true before or after swapping the actor and target context.

Type ID: `origins:undirected`
